pr_title: Add new webapi sample link in azure-spring-boot README.md

timeline.message: Add new webapi sample link in azure-spring-boot README.md

timeline.bodyText: Azure Active Directory for WebApi is same to Azure Active Directory for WebApi Obo.
timeline.author: chenrujun
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -60,6 +60,8 @@ The following section provides sample projects illustrating how to use the Azure
 ### More sample code
 - [Azure Active Directory for WebApi](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/spring/azure-spring-boot-samples/azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-resource-server)
 - [Azure Active Directory for WebApp](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/spring/azure-spring-boot-samples/azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-webapp)
+- [Azure Active Directory for Resource Server](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/spring/azure-spring-boot-samples/azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-spring-security-resource-server)
+- [Azure Active Directory for WebApi Obo](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/spring/azure-spring-boot-samples/azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-resource-server-obo)

replies.bodyText: Changed to Azure Active Directory for Resource Server with Obo Clients.
replies.author: moarychan

timeline.author: chenrujun
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -90,6 +92,8 @@ The following section provides sample projects illustrating how to use the Azure

 - [Azure Active Directory for WebApi](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/spring/azure-spring-boot-samples/azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-resource-server)
 - [Azure Active Directory for WebApp](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/spring/azure-spring-boot-samples/azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-webapp)
+- [Azure Active Directory for Resource Server](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/spring/azure-spring-boot-samples/azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-spring-security-resource-server)
+- [Azure Active Directory for WebApi Obo](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/spring/azure-spring-boot-samples/azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-resource-server-obo)

timeline.bodyText:
Suggestions:

Rename WebApi to Resource Server By Filter (depreacted).
Rename azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-resource-server to azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-resource-server-with-filter (Add -filter)
Rename WebApp to Web Application.
Rename azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-spring-security-resource-server to azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-resource-server (Delete -spring-security)
Change order to Web Application -> Resource Server -> Resource Server with Obo Clients -> Resource Server By Filter (depreacted)
timeline.author: chenrujun
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -61,7 +61,7 @@ The following section provides sample projects illustrating how to use the Azure
 - [Azure Active Directory for WebApi](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/spring/azure-spring-boot-samples/azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-resource-server)
 - [Azure Active Directory for WebApp](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/spring/azure-spring-boot-samples/azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-webapp)
 - [Azure Active Directory for Resource Server](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/spring/azure-spring-boot-samples/azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-spring-security-resource-server)
-- [Azure Active Directory for WebApi Obo](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/spring/azure-spring-boot-samples/azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-resource-server-obo)
+- [Azure Active Directory for Resource Server with Obo Clients](https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/spring/azure-spring-boot-samples/azure-spring-boot-sample-active-directory-resource-server-obo)
